description:
Serpent OS gears up for its first alpha release with Framework 13 laptop, Flathub support by default, GUI installer, improved package manager, and much more.

The post Serpent OS Gears Up for Alpha Release, Enables Framework 13 and Flathub Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Serpent OS Gears Up for Alpha Release, Enables Framework 13 and Flathub Support
